member.name: T:Sudoku.Generating.HardPatternPuzzleGenerator
member.summary: Defines a puzzle generator that makes the given pattern as a hard one. However, a hard pattern doesn't mean the puzzle will be hard or fiendish.

member.summary: Indicates the block factor.

member.summary: Indicates the swapping factor.

member.summary: Generates the answer sudoku grid via the specified puzzle and the solution variable pointer.
member.param: The pointer that points to the puzzle.
The pointer that points to the solution. The result value will be changed here.

member.returns: The task of the operation that includes the result puzzle generated. If cancelled, the inner result sudoku grid of the return value will be .

member.name: T:Sudoku.Generating.SymmetricPuzzleGenerator
member.summary: Defines a symmetric puzzle generator, that is, a generator than can include the symmetrical placement of all givens while generating puzzles.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Solving.FailedReason
member.summary: Defines a reason why the is failed to solve a puzzle.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Solving.FailedReason.Nothing
member.summary: Indicates nothing goes wrong.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Solving.FailedReason.PuzzleHasNoSolution
member.summary: Indicates the failed reason is that the puzzle doesn't contain a valid solution.

member.summary: Indicates the failed reason is that the puzzle contains multiple valid solutions.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Solving.FailedReason.UserCancelled
member.summary: Indicates the failed reason is that the user has cancelled the task.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Solving.FailedReason.ExceptionThrown
member.summary: Indicates the failed reason is that the solver has encountered an error and couldn't solve, then an exception thrown.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Solving.FailedReason.Unknown
member.summary: Indicates the other reason to cause the error.

member.summary: Indicates the original sudoku puzzle to solve.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Solving.ISolverResult.Solution

member.name: P:Sudoku.Solving.ISolverResult.ElapsedTime
member.summary: Indicates the elapsed time used during solving the puzzle. The value may not be an useful value. Some case if the puzzle doesn't contain a valid unique solution, the value may be .
